purpose: The email announces the call for papers for the 2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins (EDTconf 2025), which will take place on October 6–7, 2025, in Michigan, US. It outlines the conference scope, important dates for submissions, topics of interest, and submission guidelines. The conference aims to bring together researchers and practitioners to advance the field of digital twins in a systematic and scalable manner.
evidence_sentences: We are excited to share the call for papers, to the International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins.
2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins (EDTconf 2025) - Call for Papers -
Co-located with MODELS 2025 | October 6–7, 2025, Michigan, US
EDTconf 2025 aims to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to shape the future of engineering DTs in a systematic, scalable, and principled way.
Topics of interest include (but are not limited to): Modeling concepts and languages, methods, and tools for developing DTs.
